segments.text: This kitchen drawing captures a typical family moment gone wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is so engrossed in her task at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is overflowing relentlessly, drenching everything nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mess on the floor is just gross, slippery and expanding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea her foot is in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the children are raiding the cookie jar stealthily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs higher on the unstable stool, hand inside the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up, palm open, ready to catch a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their cooperation is kind of adorable amid the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I'm worried about the potential fall and broken dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm garden through the window highlights the indoor hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a contrast between serenity outside and turmoil in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't look away from this unfolding scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
